text: Dr Siva's wellness centre makes me feel at home. His team of sincere, warm-hearted staff and the calm and relaxing environment makes me look forward to each of my therapy sessions. Truly grateful to Dr Siva's treatment plan for me- I feel much more well-rested, energetic and myself again after starting therapy sessions 2 weeks ago.

For the last month, I've been receiving treatment at the MediTherapie Center. Dr. Arut Siva has developed a unique healing protocol over decades, and the center offers various health-promoting programs.

Every visit to MediTherapie Center is heartwarming, thanks to the caring team that treats you like family. Miss Yamuna, in particular, with her lively, caring nature, makes the interaction with her alone a healing experience.

If you're seeking a transformative experience, MediTherapie Center is the place to go.
It's been 2 months I've been coming and so far my experience has been amazing! My body feels better with every visit!!

Dr Siva at Medi Therapie is such a caring and knowlegeable man who makes everyone who visits him feel special. There is a wide range of holistic products and high tech equipment especially for those seeking treatment without side effects for  cancer, chronic fatigue and difficult illnesses.

I particularly enjoy the oxygen therapy, vibrational beds and light therapy which really allowed my mind to be at ease and to release trapped emotions. The voice analysis software is extremely accurate and is a great tool for self awareness and to identify inner challenges. I also love to try the delicious enzyme drinks and superfoods that Dr Siva generously shares.

The space is centrally located between Novena and Toa Payoh in Balestier and is child and elderly friendly. I was even surprised to see a monk using his therapeutic services! I have met quite a number of wonderful people in Medi Therapie too as I am passionate in holistic health.

I am looking forward to the new equipment he will be bringing in, as well as the health seminars and yoga classes that will be held.
Great therapies for overall wellness and specific conditions. Dr Arut is a real naturopathic genius!
